My Work

The Rover

This project was my senior project for school. I built a remote control rover that is controlled by the user through a web application. The rover was built using a micro computer , a camera module , 2 dc motors , and a battery pack. The software stack used was javascript/node.js. Live video is streamed to the users device and digital joysticks overlay the video feed for realtime control of the rover.
